ssuing8825.causeOfDeath: Crushed and devoured by sentient welcome mat

encounters.description: A deceptively cheerful mat reading 'Welcome Adventurers!' now covered in ominous stains

events: Turn 2: DM Event - ssuing8825 materialized in the dungeon and was INSTANTLY killed by a carnivorous welcome mat

lore.cursedWelcomeMatLegend: The dungeon's previous owner had a dark sense of humor. The welcome mat was enchanted to be... overly welcoming. Fatally so.
